description.value:
Attached to the top of your head is a long thin wire-like cord, atop which a soft sphere of fluffy fur is attached. This wire is shockingly strong, and cannot reasonably be broken or cut, but forcefully manhandling it is extremely uncomfortable, or even painful, to a moogle. It is said that moogle cannot survive without their pom.
Your moogle pom can be used as a spellcasting focus.
